__inputs.name: job_lifecycle_bucket_processor

__inputs.description: Name of the lifecycle object processor job, used to filter only lifecycle object processor instances
__inputs.label: job lifecycle object processor
__inputs.name: job_lifecycle_object_processor

__inputs.description: Name of the lifecycle transition processor job, used to filter only lifecycle transition processor instances
__inputs.label: job lifecycle transition processor
__inputs.name: job_lifecycle_transition_processor

__inputs.description: Name of the lifecycle populator job, used to filter only lifecycle populator instances
__inputs.label: job lifecycle populator
__inputs.name: job_lifecycle_populator

__inputs.description: Name of the lifecycle gc processor job, used to filter only lifecycle gc processor instances
